dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, listen to this, okay? March 6, 2025. Like, 11:00 AM.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, listen to this, okay? March six, twenty twenty five. Like, eleven o clock a m.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: all available sound sirens in nine regions of the country will be activated at 11:00 A.M. on March 6, 2025, under the 'Attention everyone!' signal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Eleven A M? What's happening then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Emergency sirens will be tested in the capital and several regions of Kazakhstan... in nine regions of the country

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, nine regions. The capital too, um, Astana.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, nine regions. The capital too, um, Astana.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the course of two days, a series of preventive measures will be carried out in Astana, as well as in the Akmola, East Kazakhstan, Kostanay, Karaganda, Pavlodar, North Kazakhstan, Abai, and Ulytau regions... all available sound sirens in nine regions of the country will be activated

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh. Yes, exactly! That's what I heard. For that flood drill, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh. Yes, exactly! That's what I heard. For that flood drill, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: focused on preparing emergency management authorities, forces, and resources of the national civil protection system to respond to flood-related emergencies.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! "Koktem-2025." The second phase of it!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Koktemminus twenty twenty five. The second phase of it!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The exercise will take place on March 6-7 as part of the second phase of the nationwide command and staff drill "Koktem-2025"

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, second phase? So this isn't, like, the first time they've done this?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, second phase? So this isn't, like, the first time they've done this?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, uh, they did the first one in February.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, uh, they did the first one in February.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In February, the first phase of the "Koktem-2025" drill took place, during which sirens were also tested in several regions of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh! So they've already, like, made everyone jump once?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh! So they've already, like, made everyone jump once?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! And now they're doing it again. Like, "Attention everyone!"
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! And now they're doing it again. Like, Attention everyone!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To test the readiness of the territorial alert system, all available sound sirens in nine regions of the country will be activated at 11:00 A.M. on March 6, 2025, under the 'Attention everyone!' signal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! But then they're like, "Don't panic or spread rumors."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! But then they're like, Don't panic or spread rumors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We urge residents to remain calm and not to panic or spread rumors," the ministry added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know! How do you not panic when sirens go off at 11 AM across, like, nine regions?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! How do you not panic when sirens go off at eleven A M across, like, nine regions?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously! Uh, national coordination headquarters for this whole thing is in Kostanay.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously! Uh, national coordination headquarters for this whole thing is in Kostanay.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The national coordination headquarters for the drill will be located in Kostanay.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! It's wild, isn't it? Just this massive, um, exercise.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! It's wild, isn't it? Just this massive, um, exercise.
